name: FrontLine [Tanks]
description:
FrontLine [Tanks] v.1.01


Take command of this steel monster and slay their enemies!

In your choice of machines from the World War II, including the legendary T-34, Tiger II and even E100!

You can upgrade your tank and test it in three different modes:

  • Protect the base.
  • Capture enemy bases.
  • Cleaning the area.

And if you want to test yourself, your service a dozen different achievements, each of which enhances the performance of your war machine!

Start engine, commander!

System requirements:

  • CPU: Pentium 4 3.0 Ghz or better
  • RAM: 512Mb
  • Video: 64Mb
  • Free Disk Space: 60Mb
